com.wessles.MERCury.opengl

Class Shader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wessles.MERCury.opengl.Shader

  • public class Shader
extends java.lang.Object
    An object version of shaders. Does all of the tedius stuff for you and lets you use the shader easily.
    Author:
    wessles
